attributes.action: Keep grassroots Football going throughout Second Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
All grassroots football clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make football safe. 
This petition is to fight to keep grassroots football for YOUTH going throughout new restrictions.
Benefits: 
- Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 
- Mental health maintained or increased due to social aspect of sport & looking forward to the activity each week. 
- Improves parents mental health. Taking your child & watching your child will support adult mental health
attributes.background:
Keep grassroots Football going throughout Lockdown. 
It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
